# NETWORK::NETWORK_LEAVE_PED_BEHIND_BEFORE_CUTSCENE

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** keepPickups = false: If true then any portable pickups attached to the player are kept attached to him, otherwise they are detached

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Leave an AI ped behind in place of the player when they are moving to an MP cutscene
